application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details pursuant to Condition 26 (Sustainable Drainage Scheme Details) of planning permission reference 72870/APP/2022/3126, dated 19-09-2024 (Retention and demolition of existing buildings, construction of new buildings, all within Use Class B8 with ancillary uses, alongside hardstanding, widening of the vehicular access off Breakspear Road South, associated car and cycle parking, enhanced landscaping and ancillary works).
decision_conditions: Please be advised that permitting the discharge of Condition 26 (Sustainable Drainage Scheme Details), as attached to planning permission reference 72870/APP/2022/3126, should not be construed as consent from the Lead Local Flood Authority (LLFA) to discharge into the River Penn. For avoidance of doubt, consent is still required from the LLFA.
